did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Two volumes session meeting minutes (1815-1861, 1864-1913), volume one also containing a membership list (1858) and the church covenant and confession of faith and a one volume register of members (1815-1973).

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: The Presbyterian Church of Howard was organized on July 5, 1815. A meeting house was built in 1834. The largest number of members seems to have been somewhere between 85 and 110.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Two volumes session meeting minutes (1815-1861, 1864-1913), volume one also containing a membership list (1858) and the church covenant and confession of faith and a one volume register of members (1815-1973).
